title: Velcro Fun
description: If you have toys or clothes with Velcro!

title: Blanket Tunnels
description: Drape blankets over chairs or furniture to make tunnels to crawl through.

title: Stuffed Animal Parade
description: Have your toddler line up their stuffed animals and march them around the room.

title: Dance Party
description: Put on some music and let loose with silly dances!

title: Animal Walks
description: Encourage walking like different animals (bear crawl, crab walk, bunny hop).

title: Simon Says
description: Play a simple version with movement commands.

title: Red Light, Green Light
description: A classic for a reason!

title: Jump Over Things
description: Use a rolled-up towel or a line on the floor to jump over.

title: Marching Band
description: Use pots and spoons as drums and march around.

title: Balancing Act
description: Walk along a line on the floor or a piece of tape.

title: Reach for the Sky
description: Encourage stretching up high like a tall tree.

title: Wiggle Like a Worm
description: Get down on the floor and wiggle around.

title: Spin Like a Top
description: Gentle spins to get dizzy (supervised, of course!).

title: Shadow Tag
description: Chase each other's shadows.

title: Laundry Basket Ride (Gentle)
description: If safe, a very slow, short push in an empty laundry basket.

title: Balloon Bop
description: Gently tap a balloon in the air and try to keep it from touching the ground.

title: Silly Walks
description: Encourage funny ways of walking.

title: Statues
description: Put on music, and when it stops, freeze in a silly pose.

title: Follow the Leader
description: Take turns leading simple movements.

title: "Clean Up" Race
description: Make cleaning up toys a timed race (even if it's just a few items).

title: Stacking Cups
description: See how high a tower they can build.

title: Nesting Bowls
description: Practice putting bowls inside each other.

title: Sorting Toys
description: Sort toys by color, size, or type into different piles.

title: Transferring Objects
description: Use spoons or tongs to move small toys from one container to another.

title: Building with Blocks (Simple)
description: Focus on stacking and simple structures.

title: Stringing Beads (Large)
description: If you have large beads and a thick string or shoelace.

title: Playdough Fun (Homemade)
description: If you have flour, salt, and water, you can quickly make some! (If not, skip this one).

title: Tearing Paper
description: Provide scrap paper for tearing into small pieces.

title: Crumpling Paper
description: Crumple paper into balls.

title: Opening and Closing Containers
description: Practice opening and closing different sized containers with lids.

title: Snapping Buttons (Large)
description: If you have clothes with large buttons.

title: Zipping and Unzipping
description: Practice with a jacket or bag.

title: Velcro Fun
description: If you have toys or clothes with Velcro.

title: Turning Pages of a Book
description: Focus on turning one page at a time.

title: Squeezing Sponges (Over a Bowl)
description: Practice hand strength.

title: Using Clothes Pins
description: Clip them onto the edge of a bowl or piece of cardboard.

title: Stirring Dry Ingredients
description: Let them stir dried pasta or beans in a bowl.

title: Pouring (Dry)
description: Practice pouring dried beans or pasta from one container to another.

title: Making Balls of Foil
description: Crumple up small pieces of aluminum foil.

title: Unwrapping Small Toys
description: Wrap a few small toys in paper towels for them to unwrap.

title: Looking at Books
description: Encourage independent browsing.

title: Storytelling with Stuffed Animals
description: Have them make up stories for their toys.

title: "Reading" Picture Books
description: Even without knowing words, they can tell stories from the pictures.

title: Singing Songs
description: Encourage singing familiar tunes.

title: Humming
description: A quiet way to express themselves.

title: Listening to Music
description: Put on calming music.

title: Looking out the Window
description: Observe the world outside.

title: Naming Objects
description: Go around the room and name different things.

title: Describing Things
description: Encourage them to describe the color, shape, or size of objects.

title: Playing "I Spy" (Simple)
description: "I spy with my little eye something blue."

title: Reciting Nursery Rhymes
description: If they know any.

title: Making Animal Sounds
description: Encourage making sounds of different animals.

title: Playing "Quiet Game"
description: See who can be the quietest for a short period.

title: Looking at Family Photos
description: Talk about the people in the pictures.

title: Imagining Games
description: Encourage them to pretend to be different things (a cat, a superhero).

title: Building a Fort (Small)
description: Use a single blanket draped over a chair for a cozy space.

title: Drawing in the Air
description: Use a finger to "draw" shapes or letters in the air.

title: Tracing Shapes on the Floor
description: Use a finger to trace lines or shapes on the floor.

title: Matching Socks
description: If you have a pile of clean socks, let them try to match pairs.

title: Counting Objects
description: Count a small group of toys.

title: Playing with Dried Pasta
description: Let them scoop, pour, and explore different shapes.

title: Playing with Dried Beans or Rice
description: Similar to pasta, but supervise closely to avoid putting in mouths.

title: Exploring Different Textures
description: Feel the difference between a soft blanket, a smooth table, a rough towel.

title: Scrunching Fabric
description: Play with different types of fabric.

title: Sorting Buttons by Size
description: If you have a collection of buttons.

title: Playing with Cotton Balls
description: They can pull them apart or make piles.

title: Exploring Pinecones or Leaves (If Available)
description: Bring nature indoors for exploration.

title: Playing with Empty Cardboard Tubes
description: They can be telescopes, swords, or building materials.

title: Exploring Different Shaped Spoons
description: Notice the different feels.

title: Playing with Paperclips (Supervised)
description: They can link them together (if they don't put things in their mouth).

title: Playing House
description: Use dolls or stuffed animals to act out family scenes.

title: Playing Doctor
description: Use pretend tools (or household objects) to "check" stuffed animals.

title: Playing Chef
description: Use pretend food (or toys) to make meals.

title: Playing Superhero
description: Encourage imaginative scenarios and movements.

title: Playing Teacher
description: Let them "teach" their stuffed animals.

title: Playing Shopkeeper
description: Use toys as items to sell.

title: Playing Construction Worker
description: Use blocks to build and "fix" things.

title: Playing Bus Driver
description: Line up chairs for a "bus" and have stuffed animals as passengers.

title: Playing Mail Carrier
description: Deliver "mail" (folded pieces of paper) to different spots.

title: Playing Gardener
description: Pretend to plant seeds (small toys) in a bowl.

title: Putting Toys Back in Their Place
description: Encouraging organization.

title: Matching Pairs of Socks
description: A practical sorting activity.

title: Finding Specific Toys
description: "Can you find the red car?"

title: Following Simple Instructions
description: "Can you put the block on the table?"

title: Naming Colors
description: Point to objects and ask for the color.

title: Naming Shapes
description: If you have simple shaped toys.

title: Identifying Sizes (Big/Small)
description: Compare different sized objects.

title: Counting Small Groups of Toys
description: Practice counting up to three or four.

title: Completing Simple Puzzles (If Available)
description: Focus on 2-3 piece puzzles.

title: Finding Hidden Objects (Simple)
description: Hide a toy and have them find it.

title: Playing with Sticks
description: Collecting, drawing in the dirt, making a pile.

title: Looking for Interesting Rocks or Leaves
description: Collect and sort natural treasures.

title: Make Funny Faces
description: Stand in front of a mirror and see what your face can do!
